ShortDescription.Value: This Pack adds 4 train variations, consisting of different lengths

Publish.LongDescription:
## Long Train Variation Asset Pack This Pack adds 4 train variations in different lengths, including a double size standard train. All variations exist for EU and NA themed train.
## New Assets - Passenger Train (2x8 Segment) (cap. 1680) - Passenger Train (9 Segment) (cap. 960) - Passenger Train (10 Segment) (cap. 1080) - Passenger Train (11 Segment) (cap. 1200)
